summary: Harriet Craig enjoys the married life but constantly tries to control those around her. She does not trust her husband, Walter, without checking up on him.
cast: Joan Crawford|Wendell Corey|Lucile Watson|Allyn Joslyn|William Bishop|K.T. Stevens|Viola Roache|Raymond Greenleaf|Ellen Corby|Virginia Brissac|Kathryn Card|Charles Evans|Herschel Graham|Mira McKinney|Pat Mitchell|Al Murphy|Fiona O'Shiel|Susanne Rosser|Katherine Warren|Douglas Wood
keywords: control|pulitzer prize source|character name as title|camp|family relationships
title: La envidiosa
